price: Suka ce: "Don me ba a saukar da wani malã'ika ba a gare shi?" to dã Mun saukar da malã'ika haƙĩƙa dã an hukunta al'amarin* sa'an nan kuma ba zã a yi musu jinkiri ba.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞۖ وَلَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا مَلَكٗا لَّقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنظَرُونَ
footnotes: * Dã an hukunta al'amari da halakarsu, dõmin idan malã'ika ya sauka ga mutãnen da ake yi wa wa'azi bayyane, to, halakarsu tã je ke nan.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

translations: respite would have been granted to them
